doc.previous: Arthur C Clarke 1950 presented a summary of motivations for the human exploration of space in his non fiction semi technical monograph Interplanetary Flight 45 He argued that humanity s choice is essentially between expansion off the Earth into space versus cultural and eventually biological stagnation and death
